instructions:
Cut steak in 2 x 3 inch pieces and lightly pound. Dredge in mixture of flour, salt, pepper and Steak
Seasoning. In large frying pan that has a lid, sear and brown floured meat in melted Crisco *(half at a time)*.
Deglaze pan with liquid from mushrooms and stir in Beef Stew Seasoning mix and chili sauce.
Return meat to pan and add carrots. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes. Add green pepper and onions.
Cover and simmer 30 minutes or until carrots are tender. Add liquid as needed during cooking. Add
mushrooms during last 5 minutes of cooking. Remove meat and vegetables to a warm casserole. Prepare
gravy mix using liquid in pan as part of liquid for gravy. Pour over meat and vegetables and serve. Serves 4.

*(Rev. 8/4/96)*
ingredients: 1 tsp McCormick beef stew seasoning mix
1 can (4 oz) mushrooms, drain and save liquid
name: Swiss Steak
creator: Mary & Jim Decker
